articles.title: US authorizes Pfizer COVID-19 pill - CTV News
articles.description: U.S. health regulators on Wednesday authorized the first pill against COVID-19, a Pfizer drug that Americans will be able to take at home to head off the worst effects of the virus.

articles.title: Listen to these wild sounds NASA recorded from Jupiter's moon - The Verge
articles.description: NASA has released a new audio recording of the Jupiter moon Ganymede from its Juno mission at the American Geophysical Union fall meeting last week. The unique recording is another addition to cool findings from the gas planet.

articles.title: Woolly mammoths and humans coexisted in North America much longer than experts thought - Livescience.com
articles.description: Environmental reconstructions reveal that mammoths persisted long after they disappeared from the fossil record.
articles.content:
Woolly mammoths
 may have survived in North America thousands of years longer than scientists previously thought, vials of Alaskan permafrost reveal.
